name: The search for a friend
description:
Maybe you are the last Human on earth, maybe not. Go and find it out.

Move with the Arrow Keys, Jump with "Space" or "Shift".

Please by fair, this is my very first game.

And I am Sorry for the Bugs, but I don't know at this Point how to fix them.

Musik by Rylagon and Pablo Perez.

Support my via PayPal: http://paypal.me/AronBrockmann
